        public SkipTurnRequest(java.lang.String message,
                       Player player,
                       Dice dice,
                       int row,
                       int col,
                       boolean counterClockwise)
        Main constructor of the skip turn request
        Parameters:
        message: - skip turn request message
        player: - player whom requested it
        dice: - selected die
        row: - player's row where die is
        col: - player's column where die is
        counterClockwise: - check if round is in the counterclockwise phase
